info.name: E-commerce API
info.description: API documentation for E-commerce platform with authentication, products, orders, cart, and wishlist management

request.description: Login with email and password. Returns JWT token.
Create a new category (Admin only). Requires image upload.
Get paginated list of categories with optional filters
Create a new product with variants and images (Admin only)
Get paginated list of products with optional filters
Get single product with full details including variants
Add additional images to existing product (Admin only)
Remove specific image from product (Admin only)
Generate VNPay payment URL for an order. Returns URL to redirect user to VNPay payment gateway.
VNPay callback endpoint to verify payment. This is called automatically by VNPay after payment.
Update user role (Admin only). Roles: user, admin
Add product with specific variant to cart
Sync cart prices with current product prices
Get cart summary (total items, total amount)
Get all orders with filters (Admin only)
Update order status (Admin only). Status options: pending, confirmed, shipped, delivered, cancelled
